description: Defines a ‘specialty court program’ to include drug courts, DWI/BWI courts, mental‑health courts, veterans treatment courts, juvenile drug courts, HOPE courts and other Supreme‑Court‑approved programs.  Requires that programs be included in the judicial circuit’s administrative plan under Administrative Orders 14 and 18 and be approved by the Supreme Court.  Establishes the Specialty Court Program Advisory Committee and mandates regular evaluation of programs.
